name: Dervit - B Ointment 30g 50mcg/0.5mg ointment
description: Calcipotriol is also known as a form of vitamin D. It is used in the treatment of psoriasis. It is safe for long-term application in psoriatic skin conditions. ItÂ inhibits cell proliferation and enhances cell differentiation in the skin of patients with psoriasis.
